name: PleaseCycle
tag_list: cycling, bike, gamification, sustainability, transport, csr, travel, employee-engagement
overview:
PleaseCycle helps organisations understand, encourage, and reward employee cycling.

They provide organisations with everything they need to become a bike-friendly employer; a proven way of increasing productivity, sustainability, attracting talent and generating bottom-line commercial value.

Key product is the “Cycle Hub,” a client-branded portal where employees can learn about cycling, plan routes to work, check weather updates, discuss issues in a forum, and most importantly log daily mileage in a company leaderboard. This behaviour is then rewarded through incentives - the gamification of sustainable/healthy behaviour.

The PleaseCycle team specialise in using digital innovation, employee engagement and professional services to get more staff cycling to work.
